name: Did I Just Poop Myself by the Produce Section
name_original: Did I Just Poop Myself by the Produce Section
description:
Can you avoid social interactions in time to make it to the bathroom?

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50.

Controls
  • Z: Interact
  • Arrow Keys: Move
Tools Used

- Godot: Engine

- LMMS: Audio/Music

- MilkyTracker: Audio/Sound Effects

- Aseprite: Art

- Visual Studio Code: Code Editor

Thanks for playing! :^)
